WorkItem.Description: There are quite a few issues with the 2.3.9 release for Rogues. For combat, when you change anything in the options box as far as rotation, or custom rotation, it does not change anything, changing poisons, combo point generation ability, finisher, and custom rotation check marks. Second, as has been mentioned, for combat weapon speed for MH does not seem to be correctly calculated, and it also seems that off hand weapons that would proc hack and slash (for swords and axes) is not being calculated either. Also for combat, which is probably a result of the options tab not functioning properly, is that it automatically considers you use envenom instead of eviscerate, even when eviscerate is chosen in the options tab. Stat values (as stated already) seem to be a bit off as well.

Comments.Message: L2spell my own class? Or as you say, "you class." I spelled Rogue correctly more than one time in the issue, perhaps you can correct the spelling of a properly spelled word. If you're talking about my posting name, then l2read, or l2vocabulary and look up the meaning of the words "rip" and "gouge." Kthxbai

So, you're going to take down from view some real issues with the Rogue model of the software because you couldn't read something I wrote properly, and I called you on it after you tried calling me out first? I can see you're a real asset to the RAWR team. Keep up the good work.
